--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "We shall plan it carefully my loyal Inferno, Come"said to all 
> Preds"We have stuff to do in base"
> 
>

> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Hydras:
> > > 
> > > "I COMMAND YOU NOT TELL ME QUEEN!!!!!"boomed Hydras"I need that 
> you 
> > > remain here coveren and watch Maximal base... I want to leave a 
> > > trusted soldier to plant a device when times comes"Hydras 
> handled a 
> > > strange disc device"Remember, just when I command you... while 
> > > remain cover, Maximals won't bother you"
> > >

> was
